definitions.definition: A colourless solid hydrocarbon , C 12 H 10 , consisting of two benzene rings linked together by a single bond .
Any substituted or otherwise altered version of biphenyl , such as PCBs .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry , uncountable ) A colourless solid hydrocarbon , C 12 H 10 , consisting of two benzene rings linked together by a single bond .
secondary_definitions: ( organic chemistry , countable ) Any substituted or otherwise altered version of biphenyl , such as PCBs .
